==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ち|か|てつ|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Abbreviation for {{m|ja|地下鉄道||underground railway|tr=ちかてつどう, chikatetsudō|sc=Jpan}}, from {{m|ja|地下||underground|tr=ちか, chika|sc=Jpan}} + {{m|ja|鉄道||railway|tr=てつどう, tetsudō|sc=Jpan}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|ちかてつ|y=o|acc=0|dev=1}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ちかてつ|kyu=地下鐵}}
